author: wn.com
title: A look at Legislature's scandals that have cost taxpayers
text: HARRISBURG, Pa. (AP) - Some of the criminal matters for which Pennsylvania taxpayers have doled out more than $2.8 million for legal representation of state lawmakers and their aides, since the start of 2011: - Bonusgate: The bulk of House Democrats' legal fees for criminal matters were related to the ... ...
